attributes.action: Rehabilitate Enoch Powell and bestow upon his memory the highest honour the country has.
attributes.additional_details: Every day more evidence regarding the accuracy of Enoch Powell's predictions made in 1968 is being produced, despite our electeds' admirable efforts to conceal it from us.  The man was unequivocally honest and has been proven in the interim to be so (honesty being the one quality devoid and therefore totally unexpected from our political system) and for that he MUST be honoured.
